name: Friday night couples (demo)
description: this is just a demo I am working on weeks 5&4 and after that I’ll take a break from the game the I’ll come back to is and finish up the game so you guys can have a full out fleshed mod for Friday night funkin  also be sure to leave a comment on this mod on was it good or not thank you see you in weeks 5&4 if I get it done.
